Posts.Content: I feel like friends have left in droves. Family have also left us not that we have been really close over the past few years when kids have grown up. I am so sad by it, it feels as though when it first happened we had support but as its gone on its like, oh still going on? Is it catching? We are very alone even our children can't cope which is devastating.Â
Posts.Title: We want to hear about your friendships during your cancer experie...
